snippet: Pueblo County joined Denver and Boulder in allowing gay couples to marry on Friday even though the legal fight is far from resolved in the state.
lead_paragraph: Pueblo County joined Denver and Boulder in allowing gay couples to marry on Friday even though the legal fight is far from resolved in the state.

headline.main: Colorado: 3rd County Grants Marriage Licenses to Gays
headline.print_headline: Colorado: 3rd County Grants Marriage Licenses To Gays
